bookmarks.title: Clean Code
bookmarks.description: A comprehensive guide to writing maintainable, readable code. Covers principles of clean coding, meaningful names, functions, comments, and formatting. Essential reading for any serious software developer.

bookmarks.title: MDN Web Docs
bookmarks.description: The most comprehensive and up-to-date documentation for web technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Web APIs. Created and maintained by Mozilla with contributions from the developer community.
